Submodules¶

ada_hub.lib.constants module¶

A module containing some constants for AdaHub’s runtime.

ada_hub.lib.constants.DEFAULT_CONF_FILE_PATH = '/home/taylor/Inspyre-Softworks/AdaHub/conf/settings.ini'¶

The default filepath for AdaHubs configuration file.

ada_hub.lib.constants.DEFAULT_CONF_ROOT = '/home/taylor/Inspyre-Softworks/AdaHub/conf/'¶

The default configuration directory for AdaHub

ada_hub.lib.constants.DEFAULT_DATA_ROOT = '/home/taylor/Inspyre-Softworks/AdaHub/'¶

The default root directory for AdaHub’s data

ada_hub.lib.constants.DEFAULT_RUN_ROOT = '/home/taylor/Inspyre-Softworks/AdaHub/run/'¶

The default runtime working directory for AdaHub

ada_hub.lib.constants.HOME_DIR = '/home/taylor/'¶

The user’s home directory

ada_hub.lib.constants.LOG_LEVELS = ['debug', 'info', 'warning', 'error']¶

The levels available to the logger.

ada_hub.lib.constants.PID = 2179110¶

The PID of the application

ada_hub.lib.constants.PROG = 'AdaHub'¶

The name of the application
